eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\mbox{}\hspace{-1.5em} {\cal O}\left(d^{\rm mag}(\nu)\right) 
&\cong& 2.09 \times 10^{-31} \left(\frac{|m_{\nu}|}{10^{-2}\,\rm eV}\right)[\rm MeV/T] 
\nonumber \\
&\cong& 0.38 \times 10^{-9}\left(\frac{|m_{\nu}|}{10^{-2}\,\rm eV}\right) [\rm rad/(sT)]\,.
\label{6d}
